```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

source("R/almond_yield_anomaly.R")
```

```{r}
clim <- read.table("clim.txt")

precip <- clim %>% 
  filter(month == 1)

jan_precip_sum <- precip %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(
    jan_precip_sum = sum(precip)
  )

temp <- clim %>% 
  filter(month == 2)

feb_temp_min <- temp %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(
    feb_tmin = min(tmin_c)
  )

```
